About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

I studied computer science at D.I Mendeleev Russian university of chemical technology Where i developed an immense passion for web delevlopment, programming, and learning new things, I love to design Websites , create website templates, creating re-usable projects and much more. You can find some of the technologies i like to use below.

Html, css, sass, Bootstrap, Javascript.

I use html to design static websites and make it even more beautiful and responsive with css, sass , Bootstrap, Javascript and much more.

React.js & React Native.

These technologies are one of my favorites if not the favorite, thanks to the dependencies that can be used with it. I use react.js to design content management systems (CMS) and React Native to design Mobile apps User Interface.

Node.js

Thanks to the inventors of this beautiful framework, I Use this to design full crud Functionality systems. I love it so much as well as the flexibility it comes with.
